attributes.action: Maintain, fight for, citycens democratic right to freedom of speech,equality in  quality of life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to fight for the democratic principle of  ‘FREEDOM of SPEECH’ that is the ’ lifeblood’ of DEMOCRACY.
In face of what was done to the  'Wandsworth Borough News' a 'former' independent newspaper. 

That had the temerity to publish readers letters, comments, even complaints. These were, mostly, AGAINST  Wandsworth  Council. THAT  had to be exterminated! INSTEAD, we get   the FREE  'Self congratulaTORY, 'BRIGHTSIDE'. Paid for by residents. In this, the ADVERSE CONSEQUENCES of tory policies affecting, some, i.e.Latchmere Ward residents lives and well-being, are ignored. In order to effect the Lowest Council Tax in the UK  that  buys their votes from the beneficiaries of it.
